summary: Both REQ-1 (Mic/Speech-to-Text) and REQ-2 (Export as Document) are substantially implemented. A useSpeechRecognition hook, noteExport utility, and NoteModal modifications are present. However, several specific acceptance criteria cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff, and one AC item (pause/resume controls distinct from stop) appears potentially missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide stop/pause AND resume controls while recording (pause and resume are distinct from stop).
missing_requirements.reason: The useSpeechRecognition hook exposes only startListening and stopListening with no explicit pause/resume distinction. The NoteModal diff is truncated so UI controls cannot be fully verified, but the hook itself provides no pause/resume API.

missing_requirements.requirement: Transcribed text must be inserted/appended at the current cursor position in whichever field (title or body) is active.
missing_requirements.reason: The NoteModal diff is truncated after the transcript-appending useEffect begins. Active field tracking and lastTranscriptRef are set up, but the actual cursor-position insertion logic (selectionStart/selectionEnd) cannot be confirmed from the truncated content.

hallucinated_features.description: Checklist note type export with checkbox symbols and strikethrough styling in the exported DOC file.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only required exporting note title, body with line breaks preserved, labels, and date-time. Checklist-specific rendering logic was not requested.
